data.name: Witch Maker
data.detailed_description:
What exactly is alchemy after?
In my limited life, perhaps reaching a certain end?
...Or, give up all this for a young soul.

It is up to you to play this young and confused alchemist, to start the breeding of a little girl, to conduct research on alchemy, to explore the vast land, and to obtain a wonderful healing experience in a step-by-step routine.

Game contains:
· Rich interactions with cute virtual daughters
The game provides dynamic vertical drawing supported by Live2D technology. Support click interaction, and will make corresponding actions according to the occasion, triggering dialogues that fit the situation.

· Rich development routes and endings
The game provides a variety of branch options, you can get different CGs through different development routes of different pairs of daughters, leading to a variety of endings.
You can choose the daily life of easy healing, or the drama unfolding with difficult exploration.

·Management and exploration elements
As an alchemist, you and your daughter jointly run a small shop in the game. You can obtain materials through exploration and quests, and convert them into suitable products to trade with the townspeople.

· Fun alchemy experience
The game provides an alchemy synthesis system with a certain degree of freedom, using a variety of materials and processes to synthesize props.
As the game stage changes, different decisions need to be made to adjust the synthesis strategy.

data.short_description: This is a development game where you will play as a young and confused alchemist，to start the breeding of a little girl, to conduct research on alchemy, to explore the vast land, and to obtain a wonderful healing experience .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
